Programa de Pós Graduação em Serviço Soc: Graduate Program in Social Work Master and PhD
Criado no ultimo ano da última década do: The Graduate Program in Social Work at UERJ was created in 1999. Focus attention on significant issues for the country and for the Rio de Janeiro State, related to the Work and the Social Policy. The central objective of the Graduate Program in Social Work at the Rio de Janeiro State University (PPGSS/UERJ) is to form top-level researchers in Social Work and similar fields, qualified for higher education, for the production and dissemination of knowledge by the development of scientific research related to topics about Work, Social Work and social policies in Latin America, with emphasis on Brazil, appreciating the qualified intervention within the framework of social policies.
Os objetivos do Programa e o tempo de ex: In 2013, the Master was fourteen years of the execution and the PHD was completing 9 years. The production academic of this graduate program has regarded as being of higher Rank by members of Book Evaluation Committee in this field (Qualis Books). Currently, the PPGSS/UERJ has a national insertion. The program is developing the DINTER with UFAL since the 2013. Afterwards, the foreign students’ demand for this Program and the intensification of the search for postdoc in recent years express the capacity for their advancement and consolidation. The PPGSS had his concept 6, assigned by CAPES (the National Coordinating Body for Graduate Training) in 2013. The internalization process of PPGSS is advancing, especially with the demand of students from African Countries of Portuguese Official Language and from European countries, which we hope to consolidate in the years to come.
